name: Dino Jump (berubejd)
description:
Dino Jump

A tiny platformer in Godot 3.2

This is a single level platformer built in Godot leveraging some small amount of GDScript. As I am not an artist or musician myself all of the assets used come from the community of artists that make their assets available here on Itch.io and OpenGameArt.

Note!

The end screens require you to click on the dino to choose the option.  It's not intuitive and needs to be changed.
